resources.string: Rate the severity of your symptoms:

Austin Allergy Alert was created to let people in Austin, TX view daily allergy counts and record the severity of their allergy symptoms. 

Allergen counts are found at twitter.com/ATXPollen, and are only reported on weekdays. 

Allergens are divided into 4 groups: mold, grass, weed, and tree. Pet dander is not reported. 

An allergen's severity level is determined by its group. 

Mold 
	Trace: <50 
	Low: 51 - 300 
	Med: 301 - 1,000 
	High: 1,000 - 10,000 
	V High: 10,001+ 

Grass 
	Trace: <15 
	Low: 16 - 50 
	Med: 51 - 100 
	High: 101 - 200 
	V High: 201+ 

Weed 
	Trace: <15 
	Low: 16 - 50 
	Med: 51 - 100 
	High: 101 - 500 
	V High: 501+ 

Tree 
	Trace: <15 
	Low: 16 - 50 
	Med: 51 - 100 
	High: 101 - 1,500 
	V High: 1,501+
